aspect.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
controls aspect ratio adjustment

bgcolor.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
background color for drawing, plus initial fill color

color.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
for clusters, outline color, and fill color if `fillcolor` not defined

colorscheme.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
scheme for interpreting color names

compound.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
allow edges between clusters

dpi.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
dots per inch for image output

fontpath.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
list of directories to search for fonts

fontsize.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
point size of label

id.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
any string (user-defined output object tags)

labeljust.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
`l` and `r` for left- and right-justified cluster labels, respectively

labelloc.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
`t` and `b` for top- and bottom-justified cluster labels, respectively

landscape.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if true, means orientation=landscape

layersep.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
specifies separator character to split `layers`

margin.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
margin included in `page`, inches

mindist.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
minimum separation between all nodes (not dot)

nodesep.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
separation between nodes, in inches

nojustify.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if `true`, justify to label, not graph

ordering.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if `out` out edge order is preserved

orientation.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if `rotate` is not used and the value islandscape, use landscape orientation

pagedir.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
traversal order of pages

pencolor.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
color for drawing cluster boundaries

penwidth.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
width of pen for drawing boundaries, in points

peripheries.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
number of cluster boundaries

rankdir.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
`LR` (left to right) or `TB` (top to bottom)

ranksep.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
separation between ranks, in inches

ratio.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
approximate aspect ratio desired, `fill` or `auto`

rotate.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if `90`, set orientation to landscape

samplepoints.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
number of points used to represent ellipses and circles on output

searchsize.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
maximum edges with negative cut values to check when looking for a minimum one during network simplex

size.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
maximum drawing size, in inches

splines.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
draw edges as splines, polylines, lines

style.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
graphics options, e.g. `filled` for clusters

stylesheet.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
pathname or URL to XML style sheet for SVG

target.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if URL is set, determines browser window for URL

tooltip.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
tooltip annotation for cluster

truecolor.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
if set, force 24 bit or indexed color in image output

viewport.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
clipping window on output

URL.description:
[Principal Graph Attributes]
URL associated with graph (format-dependent)
